name: Chapungu Sculpture Park
description: An internationally recognized sculpture park showcasing impressive stone sculptures by Zimbabwean artists in a serene garden setting.

name: National Heroes Acre
description: A burial ground and monument for Zimbabwean liberation war heroes, featuring a museum and impressive architecture.

name: Mukuvisi Woodland
description: An indigenous woodland offering a unique wildlife experience with giraffes, zebras, wildebeest, and various bird species.

name: National Gallery of Zimbabwe
description: Zimbabwe's premier art institution, housing a diverse collection of contemporary and traditional Zimbabwean art, as well as international works.

name: Sam Levy's Village
description: An upscale shopping and lifestyle complex offering a variety of retail stores, restaurants, cafes, and entertainment options.

name: Africa Unity Square
description: A historic and central public park in Harare, known for its jacaranda trees and often used for relaxation and public gatherings.

name: Doon Estate
description: A vibrant hub for art and crafts, featuring several galleries, studios, and artisan shops, often hosting markets and events.

name: Ewanrigg Botanical Gardens
description: A beautiful botanical garden renowned for its extensive collection of aloes, cycads, and other exotic plants, perfect for nature walks.
